spec.name: Cinerji Cinema
spec.description: Cinerji Cinema is a modern multiplex located within the Morocco Mall complex in Casablanca. It provides a contemporary cinematic experience, featuring multiple screens, modern sound technology, and comfortable seating. Its location in a major shopping center makes it a popular entertainment destination for families and younger audiences.

people.comment: The developer/owner of the Morocco Mall complex.

timeline.title: Cinema Opening
timeline.description: The cinema opened along with the Morocco Mall.
